entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening then northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
